attributes.action: To give four free rail passes to pensions, to allow them to visit loved one
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In Scotland pensions get free rail passes, and bus passes,
We in England would ask our Scottish born PM to give the same type of  rail pass four times a year to English Pensions,
This would allow them to visit families in different parts of the country and take a holiday in England should they wish
